Because many clinical decision base AMH level alone result study could bring reassurance continuous use AMH daily practice . DOC.criteria: Women write informed consent . Women ≥ 18 ≤ 37 year age . BMI 18 28 . Normal physical examination pelvic exam . Pregnancy . Breastfeeding . History disease/iatrogenic intervention could impact ovarian reserve ( e.g . ovarian surgery , chemotherapy , radiation pelvis , endometriosis ) Intake OCP two last menstrual cycle .
